title: Persian 15
text: The time cometh, when the nightingale of holiness will no longer unfold the inner mysteries and ye will all be bereft of the celestial melody and of the voice from on high.
teaser: The time cometh, when the nightingale...

prev.title: Persian 14
prev.text: Abandon not the everlasting beauty for a beauty that must die, and set not your affections on this mortal world of dust.

next.title: Persian 16
next.text: Myriads of mystic tongues find utterance in one speech, and myriads of hidden mysteries are revealed in a single melody; yet, alas, there is no ear to hear, nor heart to understand.
